name: Poop Killer 2
description:
.Camera:  First person (choice graphics option... ps1,1995,ps2...

.Controller:  Keyboard and Mouse only.

.Graphics:  Inspired by old ps1 games and the era of vhs tapes.

.History:  An over-the-top comedy mixed with horror... classic 80s horror movies.

Endings: contains two simple endings, one good and one bad!

NOTE: This game is intended to be extremely over-the-top.
